content: women sizes = s-m-l-xl and men sizes xs - s - m - l a beginner-friendly pattern with detailed instructions i have uploaded 2 types of pattern design for you as this is my very first pattern i am very curious to learn which type of pattern you like the most the more instructional one in tabular form or the prosa-like instruction i would love to get your feedback here on ravelry or on my g-mail ingesknittinglab@gmail com use this link to find an instructional video on youtube https //youtu be/2sfy78w1ktk in this video i introduce the design https //youtu be/h8kats1o1hu yarn can be substituted with other brands than sandnes however the shrinkage percentage during the felting process may turn out very different requiring other felting times/circles
